mapper.select: SELECT distinct device_id FROM userDevice WHERE status = 1
SELECT city_name, city_pinyin, initial FROM city_list

SELECT city_name, city_pinyin, time, city_aqi, aqi_category, primary_pollutant, pm25, pm10, co, no2, o3, o3_8h, so2 FROM city_aqi WHERE city_pinyin=#{city} AND time in (select max(time) from city_aqi where city_pinyin=#{city}) LIMIT 1
SELECT avg(pm25) AS aqi_data, #{beginTime} AS time , city_name, city_pinyin FROM city_aqi WHERE time >= #{beginTime} AND time < #{endTime} GROUP BY city_name, city_pinyin
SELECT device_id, city, status FROM device_city WHERE device_id = #{deviceID} AND status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE device_city SET status = 0 WHERE device_id = #{deviceID}

mapper.select: SELECT device_chip.device_id,AVG(pm25) AS inside_air,0,"0" FROM deviceStatus,device_chip WHERE deviceStatus.device_id IN ( SELECT device_chip.chip_id FROM device_city,device_chip WHERE device_city.status = 1 AND device_chip.status = 1 AND device_city.device_id = device_chip.device_id ) AND time LIKE #{time} AND deviceStatus.device_id = device_chip.chip_id GROUP BY device_id

SELECT device_city.device_id,0,outside_air,"0" FROM device_city,( SELECT city_pinyin,AVG(pm25) AS outside_air FROM city_aqi WHERE city_pinyin in ( SELECT city FROM device_city,device_chip WHERE device_city.status = 1 AND device_chip.status = 1 AND device_city.device_id = device_chip.device_id ) AND time LIKE #{time} GROUP BY city_pinyin ) AS a,device_chip WHERE device_city.city = a.city_pinyin AND device_city.status = 1 AND device_chip.status = 1 AND device_city.device_id = device_chip.device_id
